site_name: Douglas Bader Park EstateColindaleLondonNW9
description: Non material amendment to planning permission 20/6277/FUL dated 18/03/2022 for 'Full planning permission for comprehensive redevelopment of the site comprising demolition of the existing buildings and re-provision of up to 753 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) in buildings of up to 9 storeys with associated car and cycle parking public and private open spaces ancillary structures, and all other necessary enabling works, roads and services'. Amendments includes to Phase 2 only. This includes amendments to the Elevations, Plant and Ancillary Spaces, the Basement, Parking, Homes, and Floor to Floor Heights as a result of the updated building and fire regulations
